fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack two players each night, dealing an attack with a value of None.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your attacks against any target are raised by a tier for each time that target has been attacked before by anyone.
- If you succeed in killing your target, their paint will splatter over all their visitors besides you, setting their defense to Vulnerable and being framed as Death Palette permanently.
